title.rendered: Creative Content Ideas to Rank First in Google

content.rendered:
Content is the foundation of all virtual businesses. Whether you are running a blog website or an online store, the content will play a significant role in getting you rank first in Google. When it comes to textual content, there’s a need to produce high-quality and unique content.

With the help of content, you’ll be able to drive traffic and acquire potential customers. However, if you aren’t ranking at the top place in google, you’ll not be able to harvest your efforts. You will have to optimize your content as per search engine optimization rules for achieving a better ranking.

The first and foremost thing that you need to consider is to check plagiarism in the content you are producing. If you are duplicating even a single phrase from another source, your site will be penalized by Google. Therefore, you would be in need to use an online plagiarism tool.

Along with that, your content also needs to be well-researched, and it must contain infographics and other supplementary material for boosting your site’s performance. The more value you’ll provide to the user, the more chances to gain loyal visitors and ultimately top position on the search engine result page.

Netizens always expect to read unique content, and you can fulfill their desire by producing fresh content. For that reason, always check plagiarism in your content. Let’s get to know about the creative ideas to rank first on the search engine result page.

6 Creative and Unique Content Ideas and Tricks

  • Find What Your Audience Loves

Your targeted audience shouldn’t feel bored while reading your content; therefore, it’s essential to specifically work on the text that the audience will certainly admire. Without satisfying the audience, your website won’t be able to make any difference in the web world, and it will stay in the low ranks on Google. So, if you are looking forward to finding what your audience really loves, get started by conducting in-depth research on the taste and likeness of the audience. This research will help you get your hands on the topics related to your niche, which can surely admire the targeted audience.

  • Write on Trending Topics

The virtual environment that is prevailing around us readily shares industry trends with us. It is all due to the advancement in technology. Whether you’re scrolling through Twitter or watching the news, you will be able to stay updated with the dominant trends in the market.

Trending topics are essential as you will be able to share fresh stuff with your audience. However, while producing content on trending topics, do not replicate the work of others. Even after writing on a fresh and unique topic, you should check plagiarism to ensure that your content is free from duplication. While writing on trending topics, you also need to share material that is relevant to your niche. You should know about the shelf life of the topic. It will let you know for how long you will be able to harness its results.

You need to make sure that it must not have a short shelf life as it will only consume your energies, and in the end, you will be having little to no results. Your write-ups must be free of duplications, and you can check plagiarism with the help of a duplication checker.

  • Find and Use Suitable Keywords

Your content contains no worth if you are not using appropriate keywords that match the queries of your targeted audience. Therefore, it’s essential to conduct in-depth keyword research for each page of your site to get ranked on Google’s search engine result pages. However, using keywords doesn’t mean overloading your content with them; instead, you need to maintain an appropriate ratio to help your site achieve a top rank on search results.

  • Produce Unique Content

First things first, there’s no room to compromise on the originality of content. You would have to come up with fresh and unique content. If you are good at research, you don’t have to worry about producing unique and distinctive content. However, there are cases where you need to produce content in abundance, and it is not possible to generate it easily. In such cases, you can use a free plagiarism remover, which is also known as a paraphrasing tool and also rephrase content manually. It will help you to come up with content that is free of duplication in no time. However, you still need to check duplication with an online plagiarism checker to stay on the safe side. You can use an accurate plagiarism checker to ensure that there aren’t any traces of duplication.

  • Don’t Forget to Optimize Existing Content!

The reason behind the low ranking of your site’s pages on Google could be the existing content. You need to make sure that the content is properly optimized with the help of certain online tools that make this process a piece of cake. Your existing content might contain plagiarized phrases or paragraphs that could be the major reason behind not achieving the top rank on Google. By using a plagiarism checker, you can detect duplication from your site’s content and alter it with unique content to get rid of this nuisance.

  • Add Infographics in Content

Visual content makes the overall appeal of a webpage more attractive and tempting. It helps to retain the visitor’s attention, which will help you in decreasing your bounce-back rate. It is another important aspect to make your content creative by adding relevant infographics. A low bounce-back rate is a good signal from a search engine optimization (SEO) perspective. Infographics also develop a sense of trustworthiness in your visitors. They start believing that you are publishing material after thoroughly researching the topic. Thus, you’ll be able to develop a loyal base of readers or visitors to your website.

Additionally, there are cases where textual content lacks the quality to truly explain the topic, but the visual imagery makes things more elaborative. However, the visual content should also be original, and you should not replicate from others. Even the text that is added in the infographics must be free of duplication. Before designing an infographic, ensure to check the plagiarism of the text you are adding to it.

Conclusion

Producing creative content isn’t an expeditious chore. It requires time and energy to invest. Moreover, you would have to be consistent in coming up with unique content. Therefore, it becomes obligatory to check for plagiarism in every article and content to ensure there are no traces of replication.

In the last analysis, you need to stay ahead of your competitors, and for that, creativity and innovativeness are core to outshine them. However, creativity and plagiarism are two different dimensions, and you need to shift your weight towards creativity. Therefore, always produce fresh content and check plagiarism before getting it published.

Author’s Bio

Drake Wayne is a digital marketer. He has been working with high-growth companies for the past 5 years and loves helping them grow using cold email outreach.
